title: JSON schema for Team Essentials: Configuraiton Settings

statusbar.align.description: Specifies if the statusbar should be aligned 'left' or 'right'.

statusbar.hideIcon.description: Hides the icon for the filter on the statusbar.

statusbar.icon.description: Set a custom icon from the octicon list @ https://octicons.github.com/.

statusbar.priority.description: Set a custom priority for the statusbar setting.

debug.start.output.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug start in the *output* area.

debug.start.explorer.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug start in the *explorer* area.

debug.stop.output.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug stop in the *output* area.

debug.stop.explorer.description: Add the vscode command (from keyboard bindings) that correlates to what you wish to see at debug stop in the *explorer* area.

debug.stop.terminatePreLaunchTask.description: Configure if you wish to terminate the prelaunch task.
